title: Is it possible to lower Pulsefire Caitlyns Voice lines? She talks way too much.
body: Im in a few discord and ive actually talked to quite a few people and most of the Cait mains agree that PF cait talks way too much and kinda negates how special the skin is.

replies.body: I just went in and turned down frequency of how much she talks! Should be out 8.2.

This is for all the region ?
I like how much she talk. 
(>Italy)

> [{quoted}](name=edoxbox1,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=F4RXWtOi,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-01-05T12:36:20.200+0000)
>
> This is for all the region ?
> I like how much she talk. 
> (>Italy)

It's for the skin as a whole across all languages - We want to make sure that she feels more dynamic and fun to play, and I totally agree with Hope on this one; I was actually the guy who implemented her, and she just has so many dang things that cause her to talk. You can get a move line, then a ward line, then an ability line, then an attack champ line, then another attack champ line getting triggered off of a minion all one after another, and it's just a lot. I just added a little cooldown for VO between all those lines, and then added a bit more off a cooldown between attack and move lines. It's not a huge difference, she just feels more open when you play her now. Hope that works for you! Hit me back here if in patch 8.2 she feels like she doesn't talk enough!
